flawed_nl_solution:
Bucket B has 3 more fruits than C (which has 9 fruits) for a total of 9+3 = <<3+9=10>>10 fruits
Bucket A has 4 more fruits than B (which has 10 fruits) for a total of 10+4 = <<4+10=14>>14 fruits
All three buckets have a total of 9+10+14 = <<9+10+14=33>>33 fruits

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
